dict.acceptation: 限定，修饰；描述，形容；使合适；证明…合格；
合格或成为合格；取得…的资格；

sent.orig: You qualify for the vote, but your brother won't qualify till he's eighteen.
sent.trans: 你有选举权，但你的弟弟等到18岁才有。

sent.orig: Adjectives qualify nouns white adverbs qualify verbs.
sent.trans: 形容词修饰名词，副词修饰动词。

sent.orig: S-Standard Reiew-Products that do not qualify for priority reiew.
sent.trans: 标准程序审批-没有获得优先权资格的药品。

sent.orig: Because a combo box contains an edit field, some combo box qualify as entry controls, too.
sent.trans: 因为组合框包含一个编辑字段，所以一些组合框的变体也能作为输入控件。

sent.orig: Contributions to the Rotary DAF typically qualify for a U.S. income tax deduction.
sent.trans: 以扶轮DAF为对象之捐款，一般而言皆符合美国所得税减免的条件。
